markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Shabti](/Traits.aspx?ID=363)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 310</row>

A shabti is a constructed humanoid originally meant to face judgment for a living creature's sins after death.
name: Shabti
